problem_text_cn: 如图,扇形AOB的半径为1,∠AOB=90°,以AB为直径画半圆,则图中阴影部分的面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the radius of the sector AOB is N_0, ∠AOB = N_1, and the semicircle is drawn with AB as the diameter, then the area of ​​the shaded part in the figure is ()
raw_answer: 解:在Rt△AOB中,AB=√{AO^{2}+0B^{2}}=√{2},S~半圆~=\frac{1}{2}π×(\frac{AB}{2})²=\frac{1}{4}π,S~△AOB~=\frac{1}{2}OB×OA=\frac{1}{2},S~扇形OBA~=\frac{90π×1^{2}}{360}=\frac{π}{4},故S_{阴影}=S~半圆~+S~△AOB~-S~扇形AOB~=\frac{1}{2}．故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题考查了扇形的面积计算,解答本题的关键是熟练掌握扇形的面积公式,仔细观察图形,得出阴影部分面积的表达式．
